title: React.js is a component based front end library that makes it very easy to build Single Page Applications or SPAs
tuit: React JS has revolutionized the way we build user interfaces, making it faster and easier to develop dynamic web applications. I'm constantly impressed by its flexibility and versatility. If you haven't tried it yet, you're missing out! #ReactJS #WebDevelopment

title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars

title: Healthcare is a basic human right
tuit: Healthcare is a basic human right and it's time we start treating it as such. No one should have to choose between putting food on the table and getting the medical care they need. We need affordable healthcare for all Americans. #HealthcareForAll

The geopolitical landscape in Southeast Asia is complex and constantly evolving. From the South China Sea dispute to the rise of regional powers, the region plays a crucial role in shaping global affairs. It's important that we pay attention to these developments and work towards peaceful cooperation. #Geopolitics #SoutheastAsia
